welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Goffstown, a charming town known for its beautiful scenery and friendly locals. We invite you to explore our rich history, quaint shops, and delicious cuisine. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal handles domestic and international flights for major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal handles domestic and international flights for smaller airlines.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boire Field Airport is a small and modern facility, offering a comfortable and efficient travel experience.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Boire Field Airport provides services for private and charter flights, with a luxurious lounge and amenities for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to stay connected during their travels.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lawrence Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lawrence Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'LWM WiFi' from the list of available networks.
